title: how should I modify odd CSVs. and calibrate correct undistortion images?
body: ### Is there an existing issue for this? - [X] I have searched the existing issues ### Bug description hi I would like to help for going next phase. Now I ‘m confusing two problems which may be errors. These are the CSV problem and the phase which is caribrating undistortion image. I have been trying 3d Deep Lab Cut project from July in 2022 and proceeding overall project from the making project phase the triangulating two video phase. I can complete only to proceed all phases. However, I always face same errors. Then, please help you with my explain for errors. 1. Undistotion Error At first, please show these photos. ・Error Undistotion Images① Error Undistotion Images② These photos show the error of calibrating camera and making odd 3d images with images which are extract corners from my all pictures. When I try this phase, I always use over 500 images which are included in both two cameras. Also, I cut these about 10 minutes from two movie with alarm. Then, the one-third are removed for operating calibration. I paste two pictures under for showing this situation. left⇩　 　　 　　 ![left64_corner](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/114043422/192446906-7bafab52-66b2-40aa-8cb5-63f09196c2bd.jpg) right⇩ ![right64_corner](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/114043422/192446991-6b23b588-9b77-407e-b2d0-1a71c5dbb9f7.jpg) Therefore, I think I can do what I have to do for proceeding next triangulating phase. However, I always face this error. Why is this error happened? ⇩ Under picture is config file to change 2. Triangulate Error(CSV Error) I think this error which is based on first error because 3d image is odd. The reason why I think is came from under picture. This picture shows there are nothing in both of 3d images. Therefore, I think first second error is made for first error. In fact, I have another confusing point. This is what CSV file isn’t written all. please refer under picture. This picture’s “bodyparts” means “1-1(1月1日)”、“1-2(1月2日)” and “1-3（1月3日）. This csv file is made when I operate the triangulating phase and based on the h5.file. I always make this csv when I triangulate label movie. Please tell me why this situation is occurred and help me to make 3d labeling movie ### Operating System windows 11 ### DeepLabCut version dlc version is 2.2.1.1 ### DeepLabCut mode 3d ### Device type Gpu is Nothing.(The reason why I try to make 3d demo camera) ### Steps To Reproduce I think all steps from making folder to creating 3d label movie. ### Relevant log output ```shell I think nothing. ``` ### Anything else? ・When I use iPhone se2 as two cameras. Therefore, I can’t use stereo camera. ・Also, when I finish to take movies, I always convert picture type from png to jpg. ### Code of Conduct - [X] I agree to follow this project's [Code of Conduct](https://github.com/DeepLabCut/DeepLabCut/blob/master/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md)
